amendment.description: Amendment adds "photonics technology" to the list of targeted business sectors qualified to receive grants under the Small Business Early-Stage Investment Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 111-317 to add `photonics technology' to the list of targeted business sectors qualified to receive grants under the Small Business Early-Stage Investment Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kosmas amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Kosmas.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kosmas amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
